headline: Does PepsiCo's 2024 Stock Slide Make It a Better Buy Than Coca-Cola in 2025?
summary: Beverage giants Coca-Cola (NYSE: KO) and PepsiCo (NASDAQ: PEP) have been under pressure over the past year, and both have fallen by around 14% from their 52-week highs.  How far have PepsiCo and Coca-Cola really fallen?  PepsiCo's 2024 has been a little worse than Coca-Cola's. Not only was its dip from its peak slightly steeper, it's actually down more than 10% year to date, while Coca-Cola is up by about 5%.

headline: Celsius Needs a Jolt. How the Energy Drink Maker Wins Back Its Mojo.
summary: Celsius is getting its products on more grocery shelves, selling more online, and expanding overseas.
